review: Love it! Easy to set up and easy to use. I love the phone remote app!
author: Joan

review: Overall a great device for the price.  However, a lot of popular apps crash on occasion, and frequent reboots are necessary
author: Krasi

review: When chromecast was launched, I thought having no remote was a terrific idea. But I was so wrong, and I want to earn forgiveness by endorsing Fire Stick TV. You don't have to unlock your phone to use this. It has a separate remote.
author: Enrico Nadres

review: The fire stick is pretty awesome. Easy to use and there is so much you can do with it
author: Jennifer Kenney

review: Love the Fire Stick.  Small and so easy to use.  Easy to install.  Only complaint is that the HDMI  will not connect on the new Samsung TV I bought through Amazon in December.  It may be the fault of the TV because it works on my old Samsung TV connections.  I love the fact that the Stick is portable.  Great idea Amazon!
author: Sondra Worden

review: The Fire Stick works great.  Only thing is I thought it went into the USB port on the TV, but it goes into the HDMI port.  I have to unplug my cable box and plug in the Fire Stick.  But that is a minor inconvenience.  I have been able to watch movies and TV shows on both Amazon Prime and NETFLIX.
author: Mary E. Harlow "Beach"

review: Great product.  Streaming movies worked great.  Easy to move from room to room.
author: Maria T. Joiner "happy homemaker"
